wikipedia_page.main: Malcolm Andrew Ferguson-Smith,  (born 5 September 1931) is a British geneticist.

link_mentions.page: List of University of Glasgow people
response: *Malcolm Ferguson-Smith, one of the first geneticists to provide a diagnostic and counselling service to patients with genetic conditions.
*Malcolm Ferguson-Smith (born 1931) UK cytogeneticist, Klinefelter syndrome, chromosome flow cytometry
